title: [NA] Silver Tournament Team: Elo Complexity: Serious Inquiries:
body:
Team Name : **Team Elo Complexity **
Tournament Website : **[Compete League :: Bronze & Silver League](https://lol.competeleague.com/#/leagues-silver-premier)**
Tournament Stream : **[Compete League Twitch Stream](https://www.twitch.tv/competeleague)**
TLDR; Below is a lot of information about our team and the league we are in. Our application for our team is at the bottom of this page.



Prefer DUO Bot lane for better synergy:

FILL OUT THE FORUM TO BE ADDED

Don't add me in game. 


About the League : Compete League is a tournament league open to all divisions of play. We play in the Bronze & Silver League. There is a Premier League and Open League. To play in the Open League, our team needs a complete team of Five players. You can think of the open league as a 'Practice' and 'Scrim' league that you play in before the premier league. The next season for the premier league begins in June. We plan to play in this league. As a team, we will need to play against other teams in the Open League and qualify for a spot in the premier league.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game Days : Each Monday of the month, between the times of **4:30 PM** to **8:00 PM** Pacific Standard Time (Possibility of later nights based on game length) Game day schedule subject to change based on tournament admins discretion.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**What I am Looking For:**


Be on 5:00 PM PST for Practice.
Able to play at a high caliber competitively.
Willing to accept a try-outs whether they be 1 game or 10.
Able to adapt and adjust play styles to fit the team, composition, and enemy team.
Excel in communication with a team of Four others to achieve positive outcomes on Discord.
Able to provide positive reinforcement and critique for yourself as well as team members in constructive manners.
An open schedule with room to work.
Between the divisions of Bronze 5 and Silver 1.
If you are interested, we ask that you fill out our short Q&A in a post below.

Thank you, 
Fiasivimadoh

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

replies.body:
In-game Name: Gladiatorgod
Age:18
Timezone: PST
Role:Support
Solo Queue Division: S4
Discord Communication Application & Microphone Accessible (Y/N): Y
List; Your Top 3 Champions for Applying: Leona (main), Lulu, Morgana
Briefly describe your play style: aggro on Leona, Poke on Lulu, More defensive on Morgana
Your strongest attributes: Vision control, reading ADC, aggro and all in's. Teamwork and follow up's.
Your weakest attributes: Tend to value teams life over own. CS'ing. Can play to aggressive for passive ADC's. Not terribly strong but willing to practice on squishier supports.
Why you would like to be apart of a tournament team: Interesting way to meet new people, help improve my skills/work on weaknesses.
Your past experience on a tournament style team or ranked team (If Applicable):
The best time to reach you in-game: 5-9pm.

In-game Name : Owlery
Age : 17
Timezone : PST
Role : Mid
Solo Queue Division : S4
Discord Communication Application & Microphone Accessible (Y/N) : Y
List; Your Top 3 Champions for Role Applying : Diana, Azir, Liss
Briefly describe your play style : Aggro on Diana, favouring Poke/Skirmishing on Azir/Liss.
Your strongest attributes : CS'ing, communication/shotcalling, optimism.
Your weakest attributes : Less practiced on Liss atm, tend to OTP a lot. 
Why you would like to be apart of a tournament team : Seems interesting, tried tournaments once before they kind of shut down. Mostly play Solo/Duo a lot but lean towards champions that work well in coordinated play.
Your past experience on a tournament style team or ranked team (If Applicable) : Played in one High Koalaty Gaming Tournament
The best time to reach you in-game : 6 or 7pm.

> [{quoted}](name=Fiasivimadoh,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=rRFQsd1x,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-06-16T06:48:22.317+0000)

How late are you guys usually up?

In-game Name : Lilo Mikey

Age : 23

Timezone : PDT

Role : ADC/Jungle

Solo Queue Division : Silver 3

Discord Communication Application & Microphone Accessible (Y/N) : Y

List; Your Top 3 Champions for Role Applying : (ADC) Sivir, Lucian, Ezreal
                                                                                (JNG) Lee Sin, Shaco, Kindred

Briefly describe your play style : (ADC) Passive Aggressive - Mostly consist of farming but will follow up on support harass
                                                       (JNG) Early-game ganking and trying to keep deep vision 

Your strongest attributes : Warding, Map Awareness, Knowledge of Damage Output, Rotations

Your weakest attributes : Playing to carefully, Over Commitment, 

Why you would like to be apart of a tournament team : I like to develop not only as an individual but with other players also. Really brings out the team play aspect of the game to me. 

Your past experience on a tournament style team or ranked team (If Applicable) : I have been apart of at least 2 teams per season since Season 3. Also have been apart of many World of Warcraft teams and CS:GO teams.

The best time to reach you in-game : Anytime after 12pm PDT
